Reviews
Write a Review on Burger King in the city Whiting:
Your name:
Your review:
Spam-Protection: Sum of 6 plus 9
Karen posted on 07/25/2008: The staff is always friendly but the special orders are not always correct. Make sure you check your food before leaving because once you get back to work with lunch you can't take it back. This is the second time it's personally happened to my food and it makes it for a long afternoon with no food.
